title: Game Analytics JSON Event Schema
description: Format of events that are ingested to the AWS Game Analytics Pipeline

application_id.description: The application identifier (UUID) this event is associated with

event_id.description: The unique identifier for the event, formatted as UUID v4 string.

event_name.description: Name of the event that occurred

event_timestamp.description: The time in seconds since the Unix epoch at which this event occurred (set by producer of event).

event_version.description: An API version for this event format.

app_version.description: Version identifier for the application that generated the event

game_time.description: The gaming time of a session in seconds.

remote_config.description: JSON object detailing player's A/B test groups
